basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Vasilis Myrianthopoulos. I am a Backend Developer that has recently graduated from General Assembly's Software Engineering Immersive bootcamp. My goal is to provide functional backend framework that is able to process data exceedingly well. I hope anyone viewing my portfolio can see me as a valuable asset to their team.

projects.title: Alike
projects.description: Our final bootcamp project. Implementing a django/python backend to work with our react app to create a social media like app was the goal. We came up with a instagram like page that specifcally targets Software engineers to share their projects in a social media format and showing off how it looks. We put in a github link that will take the user to the github page where they can find the code and take a deeper look into the users project.

projects.title: ReposFit
projects.description: My second to last project was another group project that had 5 members. My peers and i decided to make a fitness page that users could track their workouts on. A cool addition we have is a link to another groups project that specialized in tracking food intake. Our projects work very well together and our team made a great page that works flawlessly.
